put.summary: Updates purchase order receipts which is already in the system.
put.description: Updates purchase order receipts and associate if to purchase order line item and returns status of updation.

post.summary: Create purchase order receiving information for a purchase order line item.
post.description: Creates purchase order receipts and associate if to purchase order line item and returns status of updation.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderReceipt
parameters.description: Purchase order receipt information that needs to be created.

get.summary: Gets an existing purchase order receipts information.
get.description: Gets an existing purchase order receipts.

parameters.name: goodsReceiptNumber
parameters.description: Gets an existing purchase order receipts.

delete.summary: Deletes a new purchase order line item receipt.
delete.description: Deletes a new purchase order line item receipt given a Goods Receipts Number.

parameters.name: goodsReceiptNumber
parameters.description: Unique number for the purchase order line item receipt.
